#summary Properties for Application level Logging

= log.properties =
<font size="3" face="Georgia, Arial">
#The Logger Mode FILE/CONSOLE<br/>
MODE=FILE

#The Logger Level INFO/DEBUG/ERROR<br/>
LEVEL=INFO

#The File Path in case MODE is set to FILE<br/>
FILEPATH=/home/sumeet/server/server.log

#The Format of the Date in the Logger<br/>
DATEFMT=dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss
</font>
